required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A First-in-Man Study of Sirolimus-eluting Iron Bioresorbable Coronary Scaffold System (IBS)

brief_summary.textblock: The study is a pilot clinical trial for Sirolimus-eluting Iron Bioresorbable Coronary Scaffold System（IBS）. The main purpose of this study is to evaluate the feasibility, preliminary safety and efficacy of IBS. To provide the basis for subsequent large-scale, multi-center, randomized controlled clinical trials of IBS.

detailed_description.textblock:
A prospective, single-center, First-in-Man trial;
Study population: 45 subjects.
45 subjects will be randomly assigned into two cohorts: cohort 1(n=30), cohort 2(n=15)
The clinical follow up will be performed in all subjects at 1 month, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years, 4 years, 5 years post procedure;
The Angiographic, Intra-Vascular Ultrasound (IVUS) and Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) will be performed at 6 months and 2 years post procedure in cohort 1. The Angiographic, IVUS and OCT will be performed at 1 year and 3 years post procedure in cohort 2.
The primary study endpoints:
1. Target lesion failure (TLF) at 6 months post procedure
2. Late Lumen Loss at 6 months post procedure

primary_outcome.measure: Study Device related Composite Endpoint (Target Lesion Failure)
primary_outcome.description: Target Lesion Failure is defined as the composited endpoints of including cardiac death, Target vessel related myocardial infarction (TV-MI) and clinical indicated target lesion revascularization (CI-TLR), also known as MACE (major adverse cardiac events).

secondary_outcome.measure: Immediate Success Rate
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Device Success: Successfully transit and release the IBS at target lesion, then withdraw the delivery system. Immediate residual stenosis < 30% and TIMI blood flow is class 3 (visual). Lesion Success: Any method of intervention therapy, the residual stenosis of the target lesion < 30% and TIMI blood flow is class 3(visual).

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical Success
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hospitalized period post procedure within 7 days
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as based on lesion success, there is no major adverse cardiac events in the hospitalization period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Performance Evaluation of IBS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: 4 class (Excellent, good, general, bad) to evaluate the push ability, performance of through the lesions, performance of cover the lesions, support force, withdraw ability.

secondary_outcome.measure: Device related Composite Endpoint (DoCE)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 Month, 1 Year, 2 Years, 3 Years, 4 Years, 5 Years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Target Lesion Failure, defined as the composited endpoints of including cardiac death, target vessel related myocardial infarction (TV-MI) and clinical indicated target lesion revascularization (CI-TLR).

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient related Clinical Composite Endpoint (PoCE)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 Month, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, 3 Years, 4 Years, 5 Years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Including all-cause mortality, all myocardial infarction and any revascularization.

secondary_outcome.measure: Stent Thrombosis defined by ARC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Acute (0-24 hours), Subacute (24 hours-30 days), Late (30 days-1 year), Very late (after 1 year)
secondary_outcome.description: Timing (acute, sub-acute, late and very late) Evidence (definite and probable)

secondary_outcome.measure: Thickness of acute stent recoil (mm)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure

secondary_outcome.measure: In-stent, in-segment, proximal and distal minimum lumen diameter (MLD)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: In-stent, in-segment, proximal and distal percent of diameter stenosis (DS, %)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: In-stent, in-segment, proximal and distal late lumen loss (LLL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: In-stent, in-segment, proximal and distal angiographic defined restenosis (ABR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Vasomotion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months,1 year, 2 years, 3 years
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as the average diameter change of lumen diameter before and after using nitroglycerin.

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of neointimal thickness by OCT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of proportion of strut coverage by OCT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of incomplete strut apposition by OCT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of percentage area obstruction by OCT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of healing score by OCT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of late recoil by OCT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of vessel area by IVUS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of lumen area by IVUS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of scaffold area by IVUS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of neointimal area by IVUS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of percentage area obstruction by IVUS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of volumetric obstruction by IVUS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of late recoil area by IVUS
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post procedure, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years

arm_group.description: Implantation of IBS in patients with coronary artery lesions. All the subjects will be assigned to cohort 1 (n=30) and cohort 2 (n=15).

intervention.intervention_name: Sirolimus-eluting Iron Bioresorbable Coronary Scaffold System
intervention.description: Implantation of Sirolimus-eluting Iron Bioresorbable Coronary Scaffold System (IBS)
